summary: Create a special romantic single-page website for the user’s girlfriend (Areebuu) with personalized nicknames/message.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Romantic soft-gradient background with subtle bokeh hearts (romantic-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Cute minimal heart-and-stars hero illustration, pastel style (hero-illustration.dim_1200x800.png)
- Small decorative heart icon set, simple flat style (heart-icons.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page romantic website experience addressed to the girlfriend named “Areebuu”, prominently featuring the nicknames: “Areebuu”, “Linnuu”, “cutie potato”, and “kuchhuu puchhu”, and include a sweet apology-style message in English.

Implement at least two lightweight interactive elements that make the page feel “special” (e.g., a “Reveal a message” interaction, a “Reasons I love you” card carousel, a “Tap for a surprise” animation, or a “Forgive me?” choice that results in a friendly outcome either way).

Add one coherent, distinctive visual theme for the page (colors, typography, spacing, and component style) and apply it consistently across all sections; avoid a default/unstyled look. Do not use a blue/purple theme.

Create a simple sectioned layout suitable for a single-page romantic site, such as: Hero (name + headline), Message section, “Little things I love about you” section, and a closing section with a call-to-action (e.g., “Can we talk?” / “I want to make it right”).

Add the required generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the page (e.g., background/hero illustration and small decorative elements). Do not serve images through the backend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a personalized romantic web page for Areebuu using nicknames (Areebuu, Linnuu, cutie potato, kuchhuu puchhu) and a sweet message.

projectName: Personalized romantic single-page website for Areebuu
